157. Beyond Order - the Illustrator | Juliette Fogra

The Jordan B. Peterson Podcast
07 Mar 2021

Description: This episode was recorded on January 29th, 2021

Juliette Fogra and I discuss, among other topics, the stunning art she created for my new book Beyond Order, her life story, artistic composition, her muse when creating, photoshop, fine art, music, living in chronic pain, and more.
